Basic Interaction

  1. Create Vectors: 
     var vector = new Point(X, Y);

    Note
    This is PaperScript

  2. Create Paths: 
     var path = new Path();

Paths

  1. Creating Paths: 
     var path = new Path();
  2. Coloring the Path: 
     path.strokeColor = ‘red’;
  3. Shaped Path Objects:
    • Line: Path.Line(from, to)
    • Line: Path.Line(object)
    • Circle: Path.Circle(center, radius)
    • Circle: Path.Circle(object)
    • Rectangle: Path.Rectangle(rectangle[, radius])
    • Rectangle: Path.Rectangle(point, size)
    • Rectangle: Path.Rectangle(from, to)
    • Rectangle: Path.Rectangle(object)
    • Ellipse: Path.Ellipse(rectangle)
    • Ellipse: Path.Ellipse(object)
    • Arc: Path.Arc(from, through, to)
    • Arc: Path.Arc(object)
    • RegularPolygon: Path.RegularPolygon(center, sides, radius)
    • RegularPolygon: Path.RegularPolygon(object)
    • Star: Path.Star(center, points, radius1, radius2)
    • Star: Path.Star(object)
  4. Methods:
    Note: Click on the *Method Name* to display in-line info about the Method. Click on the *Method Definition* (code) to GO to PaperJS Website.
    • Add: add(segment)
    • Insert: insert(index, segment)
    • addSegments: addSegments(segments)
    • insertSegments: insertSegments(index, segments)
    • removeSegment: removeSegment(index)
    • removeSegments: removeSegments()
    • removeSegments: removeSegments(from[, to])
    • hasHandles: hasHandles()
    • clearHandles: clearHandles()
    • divideAt: divideAt(location)
    • splitAt: splitAt(location)
    • join: join(path[, tolerance])
    • reduce: reduce(options)
    • toShape: toShape([insert])
  5. Drawing Commands:
    • moveTo(point)
    • lineTo(point)
    • arcTo(through, to)
    • arcTo(to[, clockwise])
    • curveTo(through, to[, time])
    • cubicCurveTo(handle1, handle2, to)
    • quadraticCurveTo(handle, to)
    • closePath()

Animation

  1. Function: 
     function onFrame(event) {
     // 60x/s
 }

Events

  1. MouseDown: 
     Function onMouseDown(event) {
 }

  2. Asynchronous: \

  3. Asynchronous: \

  4. Asynchronous: \

  5. Event Properties:
    • Event Position: event.point;

Misc.

  1. If Window is Resized / Resize: 
     function onResize(event) {
     // Whenever the window is resized, recenter the path:
     path.position = view.center;
 }
  2. PaperScript Scope:

    When including more than one PaperScript in a page, each script will run in its own scope and will not see the objects and functions declared in the others.

  3. Asynchronous: \
  4. Window Size:
    • Width: view.size.width
    • Height: view.size.height
    • Center: var point = view.center;
    • Bounds: view.bounds; output= { x: 0, y: 0, width: 767, height: 703 }
  5. Making Rectangle: 
     var path = new Path.Rectangle({
     rectangle: view.bounds,
     fillColor: {
         origin: point,
         destination: point + anotherPoint,
         gradient: {
             stops: colors,
             radial: true
         }
     }
 });
  6. Fill Color:
    object.fillColor = 'green';
  7. To show Borders / Select / Selected:
    path.selected = true;
  8. Math Functions [Max]:
    Math.max
